metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1000845 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultID: CVE-2017-6519.Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2017-6519.  Notes: All CVEusers should reference CVE-2017-6519 instead of this candidate.  Allreferences and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to preventaccidental usage.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000845` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

avahi-autoipd - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
avahi-daemon - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
avahi-discover - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
avahi-dnsconfd - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
avahi-ui-utils - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
avahi-utils - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
gir1.2-avahi-0.6 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-client3 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-common-data - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-common3 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-compat-libdnssd1 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-core7 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-glib1 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-gobject0 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
libavahi-ui-gtk3-0 - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
python-avahi - 0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: avahi package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7-3.1ubuntu1.2').
